"[ PERMISSION REQUEST ]"

 Thank you for choosing E Book. Before we proceed, we kindly ask for your permission to access specific features on your device. This will help enhance your experience and provide you with the best service possible.

 "[ PERMISSION REQUIRED ]"

 "STORAGE:" This permission allows us to store and access files on your device.

 "[ WHY STORAGE PERMISSION IS REQUIRED ]"

 E Book needs access to your device's storage to fetch PDF files and their thumbnails.

 "[ HOW TO GRANT PERMISSION ]"

 To grant permission for storage access, please tap 'Grant Permission' below. If you choose not to grant this permission, the application may not be accessible.
Are You Sure You Want To Exit ?
This app requires storage permission to function properly. You can grant the permission in the app settings.
